column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Based on the breathless reviews on here for Wildberry I decided to try it for a late breakfast. First
column2: the good:  this place turned over tables like a well-oiled machine
column3: and our initial quote of a 40 minute wait turned out be more like 15 minutes.  There were a ton of options on the menu
column4: and it's great that they let you choose pancakes to go along with any meal instead of hash browns and toast.  Also
column5: it's refreshing to see a place that actually has hash browns instead of home fries.
